viral_tweets.content:
There is panic in the markets.

But emotional investors are losing investors.

This too shall pass.
viral_tweets.name: Anthony Pompliano
viral_tweets.contexto_resumido: Viral due to addressing investor panic amid market volatility, offering reassurance during a dip.
viral_tweets.punto_clave_inversor: Emotional decisions during market panic lead to losses; patience is key.
viral_tweets.contraargumento_breve: Market downturns may require strategic adjustments rather than passive waiting.
image_descriptions: Thumbnail of a video discussing market panic and investor emotions.
Image criticizing politicians for wanting to ban AI to prevent profits.

viral_tweets.content:
Bitcoin will never go over $100K again.
Just buy stocks at 25x earnings, and get yourself a 50 year mortgage.  

Then sit back and enjoy your safe 9 to 5.

Ai is a scam anyhow, and it will never truly replace you because your company values you as a person.
viral_tweets.name: Bitcoin Archive
viral_tweets.contexto_resumido: Viral for its sarcastic take on Bitcoin skepticism during a price dip, highlighting investor sentiment.
viral_tweets.punto_clave_inversor: Bitcoin offers potential high returns compared to traditional investments like stocks.
viral_tweets.contraargumento_breve: Bitcoin's volatility makes it riskier than stable stock investments.

Warren Buffett's portfolio:

Stocks: $308.9 billion
Cash: $381.7 billion
viral_tweets.name: Brew Markets
viral_tweets.contexto_resumido: Viral for highlighting Buffett's cash-heavy portfolio amid market uncertainty.
viral_tweets.punto_clave_inversor: Holding substantial cash can provide opportunities during market downturns.
viral_tweets.contraargumento_breve: Cash holdings may miss out on potential stock market gains.

viral_tweets.content:
Since mid-October, Bitcoin has gone from $126K to $94K

That's a drop of ~25.5%

20-35% pullbacks are NORMAL during bull markets

Use this as an opportunity to stack more
viral_tweets.name: Rajat Soni, CFA
viral_tweets.contexto_resumido: Viral for reassuring investors during Bitcoin's dip, framing it as normal bull market behavior.
viral_tweets.punto_clave_inversor: View pullbacks as buying opportunities in bull markets.
viral_tweets.contraargumento_breve: Pullbacks could signal the start of a bear market.
image_descriptions: Chart showing Bitcoin price drop from $126K to $94K.
Image related to a gross topic, potentially satirical.
Fear and Greed Index chart for Bitcoin.

top_comments.name: Peter Schiff
top_comments.comment_text: Actually such a pullback means that Bitcoin is now in a bear market.

top_comments.comment_text: Why buy at 94k when you can wait and buy at 46.5

viral_tweets.content:
BREAKING: 

JIM CRAMER SAYS WE HAVE "ENTERED BEAR MARKET TERRITORY."

THE BULL MARKET IS BACK!
viral_tweets.name: Crypto Rover
viral_tweets.contexto_resumido: Viral for using Cramer's bearish call as a contrarian bullish signal in markets.
viral_tweets.punto_clave_inversor: Cramer's predictions often signal the opposite market movement.
viral_tweets.contraargumento_breve: Markets may indeed enter a bear phase despite contrarian views.
